page.title: 03DERBY CITY BUS SERVICE
page.content: There are{118}route miles in the city of Derby.These are serviced by {117}double decker buses,driven by{232 drivers assisted,on some routes,by{77 conductors. There are{212}men drivers{,18}women drivers and{4}women conductors.The buses cover{3,500,000}route miles each year and carry{21,000,000}passengers. Each bus does approximately{25,000 miles every year.There are about {350}accidents involving buses each year and buses are checked for safety and serviced every{10}days. There are{920}bus stops.Each new bus costs around{Â£75,000}and does only {6}miles to the gallon.Double deckers have a fuel tank capacity of{50 gallons and can carry{75}passengers at a maximum speed of{45}miles per hour.
